string-array.name: bio_q1
string-array.item: Adenosine is a …
Nucleoside, Base, Ribonucleotide, Deoxyribonucleotide
Biochemistry
Adenosine is composed of the sugar ribose and the base adenine. Sugar + base = nucleoside.

string-array.name: bio_q2
string-array.item: In hybridization method, which of the following is pressed onto agar?
Nitrocellulose paper, Silicon paper, Filter paper, PVDF
Biochemistry
Nitrocellulose membrane has high binding capacity for proteins.

string-array.name: bio_q3
string-array.item: Recombinant DNA molecule is produced by ligating …
Two DNA segments, Two m-RNA molecules, One m-RNA with one t-RNA, One m-RNA with DNA segment
Biochemistry
For the construction of recombinant DNA molecule, two DNA segments are ligated.

string-array.name: bio_q4
string-array.item: Which of the following statements is true about a vector?
Plasmids, phages can be used as vectors, All vectors are plasmids, Cyanobacteria can also be used as vectors, Fungi can also be used as vectors
Biochemistry
Plasmids and phages can be used as vectors.

string-array.name: bio_q5
string-array.item: What is the main aim of human genome project?
To identify and sequence of all the genes present in the human body, To introduce new genes to human beings, To remove disease causing genes from humans, To improve techniques of finger printing
Biochemistry
The main aim of human genome project is to identify and sequence of all the genes present in the human body.

string-array.name: bio_q6
string-array.item: Agar is extracted from...
Algae, Bacteria, Fungi, Virus
Biochemistry
Agar is obtained from an alga..
